title: NIAB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Research Associate-I Posts
description: The National Institute of Animal Biotechnology (NIAB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Research Associate-I Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Ph.D. can apply for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application...
